text: Jorje Lorenzo Guerrrero (born 4 May 1987) is a Spanish motorcyclist. He was the world champion in MotoGP in 2010. In 2008, Lorenzo signed a contract with the official Yamaha team. He was the partner of seven-time world champion, Valentino Rossi. In the Portugal championship, Lorenzo got his first victory in MotoGP. On 10 October 2010, in Malaysia, Jorge was proclaimed world champion of MotoGP. ==References== Category:1987 births Category:Living people Category:Spanish motorcycle racers
title: Jorge Lorenzo
